quote_first: If I was punctual in quitting Mlle. Reuter’s domicile, I was at least equally punctual in arriving there; I came the next day at
quote_last: , and on reaching the schoolroom door, before I opened it, I heard a rapid, gabbling sound, which warned me that the “priere du midi” was not yet concluded.
title: The Professor
